Reviews.Title: Excellent product, well above expectations
Reviews.Author: Luis Enrique Ramirez Sandoval
Reviews.Content: High performance equipment, perfect for people dedicated to web development. Stable and reliable equipment, exceeded all my expectations.This brand is the best to work for it's use in professional companies.

Reviews.Title: Thinkpad Almost A Winner
Reviews.Author: Wayne Henderson "Bobby Wayne"
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop with a very mediocre trackpad. The screen is excellent. It would also be better rated (by me) if the keyboard was backlit. I'm not sure if the keyboard can be changed or not.
